Auckland Mayor Wayne Brown set to seek a second term with polls showing he’s become a hit with voters https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-mayor-wayne-brown-set-to-seek-a-second-term-with-polls-showing-hes-become-a-hit-with-选民/ISGS6F5VE5D53G5ZUD3EMIIRM4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-mayor-wayne-brown-set-to-seek-a-second-term-with-polls-showing-hes-become-a-hit-with-选民/ISGS6F5VE5D53G5ZUD3EMIIRM4/ Bernard OrsmanHis ratings have probably improved since the CCO reforms, says the mayor. Sun, 22 Dec 2024 03:44:03 +0000 Auckland Mayor Wayne Brown is becoming a hit with voters.
Father’s actions to stop son’s ‘illegal’ driving led to costly car damage dispute https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fathers-actions-to-stop-sons-illegal-driven-led-to-costly-car-damage-dispute/YCJU6PBS3NC5HATNOWZM3VGUQU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fathers-actions-to-stop-sons-illegal-driven-led-to-costly-car-damage-dispute/YCJU6PBS3NC5HATNOWZM3VGUQU/ Tracy NealThe vehicle was damaged while later being towed and an $11k claim by the owner followed. Sun, 22 Dec 2024 03:33:27 +0000 A man who lent his car to a mate returned from an overseas holiday to find it damaged. Photo / 123rf
Piercing alarm keeping Auckland CBD residents up all night – but no one knows where it’s coming from https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/piercing-alarm-keeping-auckland-cbd-residents-up-all-night-but-no-one-knows-where-its-coming-from/QGOGOLCZTFDKRIKHQUY4F2XGCI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/piercing-alarm-keeping-auckland-cbd-residents-up-all-night-but-no-one-knows-where-its-coming-from/QGOGOLCZTFDKRIKHQUY4F2XGCI/ Frazzled tenants have contacted Auckland Council, noise control, fire services and police. Sun, 22 Dec 2024 03:30:00 +0000 The alarm has been going off at all hours and driving residents in Auckland's CBD to distraction.
Hamilton police launch investigation after man critically injured in early morning assault https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamilton-police-launch-investigation-after-man-riticly-injured-in-early-morning-assault/RYPZXM2SMFGKXDZKSGD7H7FQRA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamilton-police-launch-investigation-after-man-riticly-injured-in-early-morning-assault/RYPZXM2SMFGKXDZKSGD7H7FQRA/ The man is now in a critical but stable condition in hospital. Napier homicide: Police arrest two men after death of Boy Taylor in the city’s CBD https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/napier-homicide-police-arrest-two-men-after-death-of-boy-taylor-in-the-citys-cbd/VU5UE2OQYBA7ZJKIQW5E5FW6IE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/napier-homicide-police-arrest-two-men-after-death-of-boy-taylor-in-the-citys-cbd/VU5UE2OQYBA7ZJKIQW5E5FW6IE/ 'Police cannot rule out the possibility of further arrests and charges.' Sun, 22 Dec 2024 01:22:00 +0000 Boy Taylor, a street-dweller who died in Napier's Emerson St shopping precinct early on Wednesday morning. Police say he had injuries consistent with an assault. He was pictured on one of his numerous ventures with Taitimu Trust. Photo / Supplied

Missing teen Maia Johnston: Upper Hutt Police call for CCTV as desperate search continues https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-teen-maia-johnston-upper-hutt-police-call-for-cctv-as-desperate-search-continues/BTUTEHYMWBCCDE5GO7EXMMDKRI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-teen-maia-johnston-upper-hutt-police-call-for-cctv-as-desperate-search-continues/BTUTEHYMWBCCDE5GO7EXMMDKRI/ Melissa NightingalePolice need to know where to look before bringing in Search and Rescue. Sun, 22 Dec 2024 00:58:17 +0000 Maia Johnston, 19, has disappeared after going out for a walk from her mother's home in Akron Grove, Totara Park, Upper Hutt on December 21.
Ōtara hit-and-run: Gabriel Tuporo faces prison for hitting sister’s abuser with car https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/otara-hit-and-run-gabriel-tuporo-faces-prison-for-hitting-sisters-abuser-with-car/XS7U5JKIJ5FZLFDQIH5SA4ST44/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/otara-hit-and-run-gabriel-tuporo-faces-prison-for-hitting-sisters-abuser-with-car/XS7U5JKIJ5FZLFDQIH5SA4ST44/ Craig KapitanHe spotted the man walking and swerved onto the footpath and hit him. Photo / Michael Craig
